page.title: 04HALF MARATHON
page.content: The third half marathon in Chedburgh will be held Sunday 29th Sept. 1985 commencing at 11.00 am also a Fun Run starting at 11.15 am from the Erskine Centre. It is hoped that Sir Eldon Griffiths M.P. will present the trophies. Unfortunately this year the Police are unable to assist or unable shut-off roads so volunteers are needed to act as Marshalls. Proceeds from the race, by sponsorship, will go to improving facilities at the Erskine Centre. The draft plan suggests blocking the front of the stage to form a proscenium arch and incorporate two dressing rooms to one side of the existing stage. A questionaire has been circulated to each member of the community for their views on the proposed plan.
